title: The most under-the-radar places to visit in the world
title_page: The most under-the-radar places to visit in the world - Business Insider
text:
In Slovenia, skip Lake Bled and check out the lesser-known Lake Bohinj, which offers equally breathtaking surroundings. Andrew Mayovskyy/Shutterstock LONDON — Travel should be more than crossing attractions off a bucket list. It should be an opportunity to see some truly magnificent — and surprising — parts of the world.
That's why we have compiled a comprehensive list of lesser-visited destinations, whether they are natural or man-made spectacles, hidden wonders, or points of breathtaking scenery.
From a neon green lake in New Zealand to a hotel made of ice in Canada, here are our top 75.
Methodology: We have considered the number of current traveller reviews on TripAdvisor to rank the attractions in this list, from those with the most to least visitors.Have we missed any under-the-radar spots? Let us know in the comments.
Will Heilpern contributed to this story, including an earlier version focused on Europe.
